content: In CSV format, provide information about three unique animal species, including their scientific names, habitats, and interesting features or behaviors.

Certainly! Here's the information in CSV format for three unique animal species:

"Scientific Name","Common Name","Habitat","Interesting Features/Behaviors"

"Acinonyx jubatus","Cheetah","Open grasslands and savannas of Africa and some parts of Iran","The fastest land animal, capable of reaching speeds up to 70 mph (112 km/h). They have distinctive black tear marks that run from the inner corner of each eye down to the mouth."

"Dasypus novemcinctus","Nine-banded Armadillo","Southeastern United States to Argentina","Known for their armor-like shell made of bony plates covered by tough skin. They are excellent diggers and can inflate their intestines to regulate body temperature."

"Macropus rufus","Red Kangaroo","Arid and semi-arid regions of Australia","The largest marsupial, with males reaching up to 6 feet (1.8 meters) tall. They are known for their powerful hind legs used for hopping and can cover distances up to 25 feet (7.6 meters) in a single leap."

I hope this information is helpful! If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.
